description_en: A neutriad pistol is a 5th level small-arm ranged weapon that deals 1d6 bludgeoning damage and has the pulse (1d6) critical hit effect. It has a range of 60 feet and a capacity of 20 charges (1 usage). It has the force special property and light bulk, and it costs 3,200 credits.
source: SFS Scenario #2–08: The Stumbling Society, Part 2: Sangoro’s Gifts pg. 23
